channel.title: Requesting Logo for my new website
channel.description:
Yea so i would like to request a new logo for my website...
website link
www.weplaytexasholdem.com
(Just used a template that im modifying)
The Logo will be displayed on all of my website and on the forums also. Must be Poker based and have a cool font with "We Play Texas Hold'em" on it
Cheers to all .
